short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LiveJournal style changer: applies your defined style to other LJ posts from different users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As a user of livejournal.com I want to see the posts of other users decorated with my style. The aim of this extension is to apply a style of currently logged in user to all posts of all users.
